sentences.sContent: I became conscious of someone watching me.
sentences.sCn: 我察觉到有人在监视我。

sentences.sContent: ...we are not trying to assign blame or criticize anyone or call anyone conscious Its of this study to open up meaningful dialogues on implicit gender bias...
...asking the students to be conscious of the importance of correct spelling from the very beginning of their English study...
...some of which might not be well-purposed and do some conscious or unconscious damage to the valuable treasures which used to be well-preserved in the museums...

synos.tran: 意识到的；故意的；神志清醒的

remMethod.val: con ＋ sci(知道) ＋ ous → 知道的 → 神志清醒的
